MetadataContainer.name: MetadataContainer
MetadataContainer.description: Manages working copies of ApexClassMember, ApexTriggerMember, ApexPageMember, and ApexComponentMember objects, including collections of objects to be deployed together.

Name.description: The name of the MetadataContainer. If a container with the same name already exists, an error is reported on create() or POST.This field is required.
